1187850.name: Fairies vs Bugs
1187850.description:
Fairys vs Bugs is a casual elimination game.
Connect multiple elements with the mouse, eliminate the elements, and complete the level goals within the specified number of steps.

Need to recruit more fairies, use the skills of the fairy in different levels.
Need to use game props at the right time.
Add 1 energy every 10 minutes.

Game features:
A total of 20 fairies can be recruited.
There are 80 levels to play with.
8 game props for flexible use
Fairies can be level up and upgrade to increase damage and skill range.

Rules of play:
The operation is extremely simple, just connect the elements with the mouse, and the more connections, the better.
The goal must be completed within the specified number of steps.
Click on the fairy in the game to see the skill energy of the fairy.
Each game use 5 energy and restores 1 energy every 10 minutes.
If you feel that the fairy has insufficient damage, please level up the fairy.

--------------------------------------------------------
once up on a time...
1187850.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
